TextView.android:text:
1.) Power Saving Mode : It disables many elements such as WiFi, Data Connection,Bluetooth,Location,etc. along with reducing the screen brightness to 0% and clearing the running apps in the background. 2.) Ultra Mode : It only reduces the screen brightness and cleares the apps running in the background 3.) Disable Network : It only disables the Data Connection,WiFi,Location and Bluetooth,etc. i.e. Networks
*Note : Using the Power Saving Mode the user can increase the battery life till 40% without using any other applications.
